chef.name: Chef Kisan Raval
chef.tagline: Culinary Artist | Passion for Authentic Flavors
chef.bio: With over 5 years of experience in fine dining, I bring traditional recipes to life with a modern twist. My journey through Italian, Indian, and French cuisines has shaped my unique approach to cooking - honoring tradition while embracing innovation.

dishes.name: Pasta Carbonara
dishes.shortDescription: Creamy Roman classic with pancetta and pecorino
dishes.fullDescription: Traditional Roman pasta dish made with eggs, pecorino cheese, guanciale, and black pepper. A perfect harmony of simple ingredients creating an unforgettable comfort food experience.

dishes.name: Margherita Pizza
dishes.shortDescription: Wood-fired with fresh mozzarella and basil
dishes.fullDescription: Classic Neapolitan pizza with San Marzano tomatoes, fresh mozzarella di bufala, extra virgin olive oil, and fresh basil leaves. Baked in a wood-fired oven at 485°C for 90 seconds.

dishes.name: Tiramisu
dishes.shortDescription: Classic Italian dessert with espresso and mascarpone
dishes.fullDescription: Layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and rich mascarpone cream, dusted with cocoa powder. A delightful end to any meal with the perfect balance of sweetness and coffee bitterness.

dishes.name: Risotto ai Funghi
dishes.fullDescription: Arborio rice slowly cooked with wild mushrooms, white wine, and parmesan cheese. Each grain perfectly creamy while maintaining a slight bite.

dishes.name: Butter Chicken
dishes.shortDescription: Tender chicken in rich tomato cream sauce
dishes.fullDescription: Succulent pieces of tandoori chicken cooked in a velvety tomato-based gravy with butter, cream, and aromatic spices. Served with naan or basmati rice for the ultimate comfort food.

dishes.name: Palak Paneer
dishes.shortDescription: Cottage cheese in creamy spinach gravy
dishes.fullDescription: Fresh cottage cheese cubes in a smooth, aromatic spinach sauce with garlic, ginger, and Indian spices. A nutritious and delicious vegetarian favorite.

dishes.name: Biryani
dishes.shortDescription: Fragrant basmati rice with aromatic spices
dishes.fullDescription: Layers of basmati rice and marinated meat slow-cooked with saffron, whole spices, and herbs. Each grain infused with flavor, served with raita and shorba.

dishes.name: Tandoori Chicken
dishes.shortDescription: Clay oven roasted chicken with yogurt marinade
dishes.fullDescription: Chicken marinated in yogurt and spices, cooked in a traditional tandoor clay oven. Smoky, tender, and bursting with flavor.

dishes.name: Coq au Vin
dishes.shortDescription: Chicken braised in red wine with mushrooms
dishes.fullDescription: Classic French dish of chicken slowly braised in Burgundy wine with pearl onions, mushrooms, and bacon. A rustic yet elegant dish perfect for special occasions.

dishes.name: Crème Brûlée
dishes.shortDescription: Vanilla custard with caramelized sugar crust
dishes.fullDescription: Silky smooth vanilla bean custard topped with a layer of caramelized sugar that cracks perfectly with each spoonful. The quintessential French dessert experience.

dishes.name: Beef Bourguignon
dishes.shortDescription: Slow-braised beef in red wine sauce
dishes.fullDescription: Tender beef chunks slow-cooked in red wine with carrots, onions, and herbs. A rich and hearty French classic that melts in your mouth.
